transportAdvice: Doha has a modern metro system that connects major tourist areas, malls, and the airport, supplemented by a bus network; taxis and ride-hailing services are widely available and affordable. Walking is practical in cooler months and in pedestrian-friendly areas like the Corniche and Souq Waqif, but the summer heat and car-centric layout make it impractical in most neighborhoods.

weather.description: Mild and pleasant with cool evenings, making it one of the best months to visit.
Comfortable temperatures continue with occasional light rain and gentle breezes.
Warming up noticeably with mostly sunny skies and comfortable daytime conditions.
Hot and dry with very little rainfall; outdoor sightseeing is still manageable in the morning.
Intense heat begins; outdoor activities are best limited to early morning or evening.
Extremely hot and increasingly humid; most activity shifts indoors to air-conditioned spaces.
Peak summer heat with high humidity makes outdoor exposure uncomfortable and potentially hazardous.
Conditions remain oppressively hot and humid; indoor attractions and malls dominate visitor itineraries.
Still very hot with lingering humidity, though temperatures begin a gradual decline toward month's end.
Noticeably more comfortable with warm days and milder evenings; outdoor exploration becomes enjoyable again.
Pleasant autumn weather with warm days and cool nights, ideal for sightseeing and outdoor dining.
Cool and comfortable with occasional light showers; one of the most popular months for tourism.
